data.message: Fintech conversion psychology: 1) CTAs need safety rails for money products - add microcopy like "No commitment. See live deals before funding. Identity verification required. Capital held with regulated custodians." 2) Tertiary CTAs for skeptical users: "See live deal examples" or "View diligence sample". 3) Feature cards should show "how it works" with mini UI examples (deal score chips, checklist snippets, sparklines) not just conceptual labels. 4) Grey text on dark gradients fails accessibility - bump contrast on key paragraphs.
